subject: [Radiance-general] the -r option
body:
THat error is rarely seen any more, if you are using a recent version of Radiance (oconv, actually). You can also try .obj format instead of .3ds. Both of these approaches will require you to use Radiance from the command line, though. It sounds like you're trying to use the Ecotect GUI for everything, which may not be possible -- I have no idea for certain, because I don't have a copy of Ecotect.

- Rob


On Aug 29, 2013, at 12:56 PM, Hugo Testolini <hugo.testolini at gmail.com> wrote:
